issue.title: [JS] Define code entry point for integration testing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1502](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1502). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This needs to provide a similar command line interface to the Java and C++ integration testing entry points:

- Command: convert JSON to Arrow, or Arrow to JSON
- Arrow file path
- JSON file path
